message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000, which is the minimum price I'm willing to accept. Please let me know if this is something you're interested in.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to discussing this further.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1,000,000 is your maximum budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $1,100,000. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
